00243 bool EDEI_API
00244 _conversion (EDEIprocess::Component* _val, const std::string & in);
00245 
00246 inline std::string
00247 toString(EDEIprocess::Component comp) {
00248   switch (comp) {
00249   case EDEIprocess::ABS : return "absorption";
00250   case EDEIprocess::REF : return "refraction";
00251   default : throw_error("EDEI component name", "Unknown component.");
00252   }
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 
00264 template<int N_rank> void
00265 EDEIprocess::extract (const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & minus,
00266                       const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & plus,
00267                       Component comp,
00268                       blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & out) const {
00269 
00270   if ( minus.shape() != plus.shape() )
00271     throw_error(modname, "Geometry of the minus and plus"
00272                 " arrays do not match." );
00273   if ( minus.shape() != out.shape() )
00274     out.resize(minus.shape());
00275 
00276   typename blitz::Array<float, N_rank>::iterator
00277     ocur = out.begin(), oend=out.end();
00278   typename blitz::Array<float, N_rank>::const_iterator
00279     pcur = plus.begin(), mcur = minus.begin();
00280 
00281   while (ocur != oend)
00282     *ocur++ = extract(*mcur++, *pcur++, comp);
00283 
00284 }

00295 class EDEIexp : public Experiment {
00296 private:
00297 
00298   static const std::string modname;  
00299   AqSeries Mlist;              
00300   AqSeries Plist;              
00301   EDEIprocess proc;             
00302   EDEIprocess::Component comp;  
00303 
00304 
00305 public:
00306 
00314   inline EDEIexp(const EDEIprocess & _proc, EDEIprocess::Component _comp,
00315                  const AqSeries & _Mlist, const AqSeries & _Plist)  :
00316     Experiment(_Mlist.shape(), _Mlist.thetas()),
00317     proc(_proc),
00318     Mlist(_Mlist),
00319     Plist(_Plist)
00320   {
00321     if ( Mlist.thetas() != Plist.thetas() )
00322       throw_error(modname, "Different sizes of the data aquired in minus and plus positions.");
00323     if ( Mlist.shape() != Plist.shape() )
00324       throw_error(modname, "Different shapes of the data aquired in minus and plus positions.");
00325     component(_comp);
00326   }
00327 
00328 
00329   inline void projection(int itheta, Map & proj,
00330                          const std::vector<int> & sliceV = std::vector<int>() ) const {
00331     Map prM(sh), prP(sh);
00332     Mlist.projection(itheta, prM, sliceV);
00333     Plist.projection(itheta, prP, sliceV);
00334     proc.extract( prM, prP, comp, proj);
00335   }
00336 
00341   inline void component(EDEIprocess::Component _comp) {
00342     comp = _comp;
00343     cntr = ( comp == EDEIprocess::ABS ) ? Contrast::ABS : Contrast::REF ;
00344   }
00345 
00346 };
